com.cosylab.vdct
Class DataSynchronizer

java.lang.Object
  com.cosylab.vdct.DataSynchronizer

public class DataSynchronizer
extends java.lang.Object

DataSynchronizer handles synchronization between loaded files and files on the file system. It checks for unsaved changes or file system changes and brings up the appropriate dialogs.

Author:
ssah
